mapper.insert: insert into `order_form` (order_id, user_id, product_id, shop_id, order_username, order_phone, order_address, order_user_remark, order_shop_remark, order_status, create_time, last_edit_time) VALUE (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{shopId}, #{orderUsername}, #{orderPhone}, #{orderAddress}, #{orderUserRemark}, #{orderShopRemark}, #{orderStatus}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime});
mapper.select: select order_id, user_id, product_id, shop_id, order_username, order_phone, order_address, order_user_remark, order_shop_remark, order_status, create_time, last_edit_time from order_form where shop_id = #{shopId};

select order_id, user_id, product_id, shop_id, order_username, order_phone, order_address, order_user_remark, order_shop_remark, order_status, create_time, last_edit_time from order_form where shop_id = #{shopId} and order_status != 0 ;

select order_id, user_id, product_id, shop_id, order_username, order_phone, order_address, order_user_remark, order_shop_remark, order_status, create_time, last_edit_time from order_form where shop_id = #{shopId} and order_status = 0;

select order_id, user_id, product_id, shop_id, order_username, order_phone, order_address, order_user_remark, order_shop_remark, order_status, create_time, last_edit_time from order_form where order_id = #{orderId};
